rules_text: When Back Country Navigator enters, arm target creature you control. That creature can't be blocked this turn. [i](Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2} attached to it.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Sure, I can get ya to the tunnels, lady. But you're on your own once you get down into ‘em, and you might not like what you find.”[/i]
